verses.verse: <S%H120>"Man,<s%> who is <S%H3205>born<s%> of <S%H802>woman,<s%> Is short-lived and <S%H7649>full<s%> of <S%H7267>turmoil.<s%>
"Like a <S%H6731>flower<s%> he <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> and <S%H9268>withers.<s%> He also <S%H1272>flees<s%> like a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> and does not <S%H5975>remain.<s%>
"Thou <S%H637>also<s%> dost <S%H6491>open<s%> Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on him, And <S%H935>bring<s%> him into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with Thyself.
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> can <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H2889>clean<s%> out of the <S%H2931>unclean<s%>? <S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H259>one!<s%>

<S%H518>"Since<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H2782>determined,<s%> The <S%H4557>number<s%> of his <S%H2320>months<s%> is with Thee, And his <S%H2706>limits<s%> Thou hast <S%H6213>set<s%> so that he <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5674>pass.<s%>
<S%H8159>"Turn<s%> Thy <S%H8159>gaze<s%> from him that he may <S%H2308>rest,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> he <S%H7521>fulfills<s%> his <S%H3117>day<s%> like a <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>man.<s%>

"For <S%H3426>there<s%> is <S%H8615>hope<s%> for a <S%H6086>tree,<s%> <S%H518>When<s%> it is <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down,<s%> that it will <S%H2498>sprout<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> And its <S%H3127>shoots<s%> will not <S%H2308>fail.<s%>
<S%H518>"Though<s%> its <S%H8328>roots<s%> <S%H2204>grow<s%> <S%H2204>old<s%> in the <S%H776>ground,<s%> And its <S%H1503>stump<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> in the <S%H6083>dry<s%> <S%H6083>soil,<s%>
At the <S%H7381>scent<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> it will <S%H6524>flourish<s%> And <S%H6213>put<s%> <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H9524>sprigs<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H5194>plant.<s%>
"But <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> and <S%H2522>lies<s%> <S%H2522>prostrate.<s%> <S%H120>Man<s%> <S%H1478>expires,<s%> and <S%H335>where<s%> is he?
"[As] <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H235>evaporates<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> And a <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H9162>becomes<s%> <S%H9162>parched<s%> and <S%H3001>dried<s%> up,

So <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> and does not <S%H6965>rise.<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> be <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H1115>more,<s%> He will not <S%H9516>awake<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> be <S%H5782>aroused<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep.<s%>

<S%H4310>"Oh<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that Thou wouldst <S%H6845>hide<s%> me in <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> That Thou wouldst <S%H5641>conceal<s%> me <S%H5704>until<s%> Thy <S%H639>wrath<s%> <S%H7725>returns<s%> [to Thee,] That Thou wouldst <S%H7896>set<s%> a <S%H2706>limit<s%> for me and <S%H2142>remember<s%> me!

<S%H518>"If<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H4191>dies,<s%> will he <S%H2421>live<s%> [again?] <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H6635>struggle<s%> I will <S%H3176>wait,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> my <S%H2487>change<s%> <S%H935>comes.<s%>
"Thou wilt <S%H7121>call,<s%> and I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> Thee; Thou wilt <S%H3700>long<s%> for the <S%H4639>work<s%> of Thy <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
"For <S%H6258>now<s%> Thou dost <S%H5608>number<s%> my <S%H6806>steps,<s%> Thou dost not <S%H8104>observe<s%> my <S%H9128>sin.<s%>
"My <S%H6588>transgression<s%> is <S%H2856>sealed<s%> up in a <S%H6872>bag,<s%> And Thou dost <S%H2950>wrap<s%> up my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
"But the <S%H5307>falling<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5034>crumbles<s%> <S%H5034>away,<s%> And the <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H6275>moves<s%> from its <S%H4725>place;<s%>

<S%H4325>Water<s%> <S%H7833>wears<s%> <S%H7833>away<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> Its <S%H9372>torrents<s%> <S%H7857>wash<s%> <S%H7857>away<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> So Thou dost destroy man's <S%H6>hope.<s%>
"Thou dost <S%H5331>forever<s%> <S%H8630>overpower<s%> him and he <S%H1980>departs;<s%> [Thou] dost <S%H8132>change<s%> his <S%H6440>appearance<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> him <S%H7971>away.<s%>

"His <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3513>achieve<s%> <S%H3513>honor,<s%> but he does not <S%H3045>know<s%> [it;] Or they <S%H6819>become<s%> <S%H6819>insignificant,<s%> but he does not <S%H995>perceive<s%> it.
"But his <S%H1320>body<s%> <S%H3510>pains<s%> him, And he <S%H56>mourns<s%> only for <S%H5315>himself.<s%>"
